LanguageData.BadMusic.stages.bad_music.label: bad music
LanguageData.BadMusic.stages.bad_music.description: This is just noise, it makes me hate the very idea of music.
LanguageData.GreatMusic.stages.great_music.label: great music
LanguageData.GreatMusic.stages.great_music.descriptio: This music is beautiful, it lets me forget my worries.
LanguageData.NiceMusic.stages.nice_music.label: nice music
LanguageData.NiceMusic.stages.nice_music.description: Some music helps the colony feel more alive.
